name: PlugDJ Smooth Style BETA 1.00
additional_info:
--------READ NOW------
I am glad to announce that this style is now in Beta!
(> = Added.  * = Fixed.  - = removed.)

1.00
> Javascript booklet (In progress)
> Chrome Extension ( Almost done!)
!!! NOTE: STYLISH SUPPORT WILL BE REMOVED! HOWEVER, YOU CAN STILL USE THE STYLE ON THE VERSION 1.25 (PLANNED) !!!

0.99
> BIG UI IMPROVEMENTS!
* VOTE + DJ BUTTON


0.98
* Moved Vote and DJ buttons.
* Re-Styled EVERYTHING!
> Themed iPlug Menu (Requires the iPlug chrome extension)
> Themed Plug Pro (Requires the PlugPRO chrome extension)
> Themed Videos (No border)
> Tweaked chat settings
